Package qc.ca.bdeb._420_a02_bb.tp1

Class Order

java.lang.Object
qc.ca.bdeb._420_a02_bb.tp1.Order
public class Order extends Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Order(String title, String rebate, double price, double regularPrice)
    Order is an object that is generated as the user navigates through the menus.
    It contains:
    Name of the title Name of the pricing selected Price without rebate (Regular) Price with the according to the selected pricing Amount of the rebate
    It is used to generate the receipt at the end of the transaction.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    calcChange(double amount)
    Method to calculate the change to return.
    It will only return bills of 20$, 10$ and 5$.
    It will only return coins of 2$, 1$, 0.25$, 0.10$ and 0.05$

    It returns a HashMap of the bills or coins with the amount of each to return.
    void
    printChange()
    Method to print the change to return without showing the bills or coins that are at 0.
    void
    printOrder()
    Method that will print the current order for user validation before the payment.
    void
    printReceipt()
    Method that will print the receipt at the end of the transaction with the following format:
    "*********************************************" "Titre: " + this.title "Prix Régulier: %.2f$\n", this.regularPrice "Tarif: " + this.rebateName "Prix avec rabais: %.2f$\n", this.price "Vos économies: %.2f$\n", this.savings "*********************************************" "Vous avez payé: %.2f$\n", this.price "*********************************************" "Merci de faire confiance à la STM" "*********************************************"

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Order

      public Order(String title, String rebate, double price, double regularPrice)
      Order is an object that is generated as the user navigates through the menus.
      It contains:
      • Name of the title
      • Name of the pricing selected
      • Price without rebate (Regular)
      • Price with the according to the selected pricing
      • Amount of the rebate

      It is used to generate the receipt at the end of the transaction.

  • Method Details

    • printOrder

      public void printOrder()
      Method that will print the current order for user validation before the payment.

    • printReceipt

      public void printReceipt()
      Method that will print the receipt at the end of the transaction with the following format:
      • "*********************************************"
      • "Titre: " + this.title
      • "Prix Régulier: %.2f$\n", this.regularPrice
      • "Tarif: " + this.rebateName
      • "Prix avec rabais: %.2f$\n", this.price
      • "Vos économies: %.2f$\n", this.savings
      • "*********************************************"
      • "Vous avez payé: %.2f$\n", this.price
      • "*********************************************"
      • "Merci de faire confiance à la STM"
      • "*********************************************"

    • calcChange

      public void calcChange(double amount)
      Method to calculate the change to return.
      It will only return bills of 20$, 10$ and 5$.
      It will only return coins of 2$, 1$, 0.25$, 0.10$ and 0.05$

      It returns a HashMap of the bills or coins with the amount of each to return. Anything below 0.05$ is discarded and kept by the merchant.

    • printChange

      public void printChange()
      Method to print the change to return without showing the bills or coins that are at 0.
